text: "Breathe Again" is a 1993 song by American singer Toni Braxton and taken from her debut self-titled studio album Toni Braxton. It won a Grammy Award in 1995. It went to number 1 in Zimbabwe, number 2 in Australia, El Salvador, New Zealand and the United Kingdom, number 3 in the United States, number 7 in Canada, the Netherlands and Norway and number 10 in Ireland. ==Track listings and formats== * US CD single # "Breathe Again" (radio edit) # "Breathe Again" (extended mix) # "Breathe Again" (Breathless mix) # "Breathe Again" (club mix) # "Breathe Again" (Spanish version) * UK and German CD single # "Breathe Again" (radio edit) # "Breathe Again" (D'Jeep mix) # "Breathe Again" (extended club mix) # "Breathe Again" (D'Moody mix) # "Breathe Again" (Breathless mix) # "Breathe Again" (Spanish version) * Spanish CD single # "Breathe Again" (versi√≥n en Castellano) # "Another Sad Love Song" (album version) Category:1993 songs Category:1990s ballads Category:R&B; ballads Category:Toni Braxton songs
title: Breathe Again
